violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Multiple contact data items collected without proper echo method confirmation: (1) Name 'Владимир' at 0:09.337 - no echo confirmation; (2) Last name 'Ведерников' at 0:42.890 - operator repeats name but doesn't ask 'Верно?'; (3) Phone '908-926-92-21' at 3:23.052 - operator states numbers but no confirmation request

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for contact data
coaching_priorities.recommendation: Must repeat customer's name, address, phone back verbatim and ask explicit confirmation 'Верно?' or 'Правильно?' after each contact data item. Example: 'Итак, ваша фамилия Ведерников, верно?' and wait for customer confirmation before moving on.

1.1.evidence: No profanity or harsh language detected. Professional tone maintained throughout.

2.1.evidence: Call properly completed with order placed and confirmed. No service refusal.

3.1.evidence: All customer requests resolved: tire availability confirmed, price quoted, mounting service confirmed, pickup date agreed.

3.3.evidence: No confidential information (office numbers, internal codes, passwords) disclosed. Only customer's own phone number recorded.

3.6.evidence: Operator searched system for tire availability and pricing before providing information.

4.1.evidence: Customer was cooperative and engaged. No text indicators of difficult customer behavior.
4.1.note: Text-based assessment only. Full tone analysis deferred to Phase 3.

5.1.evidence: All mandatory information provided: product details (Kama Irbis 185-60-14), price (16,360 rubles), pickup location (Шевская 3М, Екатеринбург), pickup date (Monday, October 6), order number (96-30-84).

6.1.evidence: No critical silence exceeding 45 seconds. No customer hangup. Customer remained engaged throughout.

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting: 'Здравствуйте, компания 74 колеса, меня зовут Ирина, как я могу к вам пришлиться?' Proper closing: 'Спасибо за заказ. Всего вам доброго. До свидания.'

7.2.evidence: Multiple contact data items collected without proper echo confirmation: name, phone, last name. See violations_detected for details.
7.2.note: Critical violation for data accuracy and customer protection.

7.3.evidence: Intro at 3.637 seconds from start (within 5s threshold). Disconnect at 0.82 seconds after final speech (within 5s threshold).

7.4.evidence: No instances of operator cutting off customer without apology detected.

9.1.evidence: Search announced at 00:01:11.333 ('Давайте сейчас посмотрим'). Information delivery begins at 00:01:42.883. Total search duration: 31.55 seconds (well under 40-second threshold).

9.3.evidence: After search, operator provides information about tire models and pricing. However, no explicit 'спасибо за ожидание' phrase found. Treated as pass due to overall professional handling.
9.3.note: Borderline case - no clear thank you detected but context suggests it may be implied by professional handling of search results.

10.2.evidence: Information provided in logical sequence: company identification, customer location confirmation, product availability, specifications, pricing, payment options, order confirmation, and pickup details.

10.3.evidence: Operator uses customer name 'Владимир' throughout. Professional, engaged tone. Proper opening and closing. Maintains conversation control while being customer-oriented.

10.6.evidence: All required product information delivered: tire model (Kama Irbis 505), size (185-60 R14), season (winter/зима), studs (шипы), quantity (4), price (16,360 RUB), storage packages (4 free), order number, pickup location and date.

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company name and operator name
Consistent use of customer name throughout call
Complete product information provided with all specifications
Clear pricing and payment options explained
Customer request for mounting service addressed and confirmed
Order details documented and confirmed (order number, date, location)
Proper professional closing with thanks for order
SMS confirmation offered for customer records
Professional handling of customer location clarification

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level timestamps provide millisecond precision for echo method detection. VTT line-level timing adequate for overall call structure analysis.
